title: These gorgeous AirPods CT scans show Apple’s earbuds in a whole new light
content: After a prototype of translucent AirPods was shared last week, we now have a fascinating look at the inside of the rest of Apple’s AirPods earbuds thanks to a few stunning CT scans. Scan of the Month, which last month showed off a Lego minifig, uses computerized tomography scans (the same ones used by doctors to […]
